ValidationRule.description: Sales team cannot move the stage backwards from "Ready to Ship" or "Closed Won". Order can move only via admin, finance or operations team.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordTypeId <> "0121a000000ARoK", ISCHANGED(StageName), PRIORVALUE(Probability)> 0.95, Probability < PRIORVALUE(Probability), NOT( OR( $Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption, CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Finance"), $Profile.Name="Order Operations Admin" ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot move the opportunity backwards from Ready to Ship or Closed Won. Only Finance, Operations and Admins can move orders past the stage of Closing.
